name: Clever Chameleon
description:
This is just a small prototype of a game that I made for the mini jam. You are a chameleon who blends into everything you walk past, which can put you into some sticky situations. 

  • W & D or <- & -> to move left and right
  • Space to jump (Press 2x to double jump)

I only had time to create a few "tutorial" levels, but I hope you enjoy!
